Hallo Miller. How are you?: Very well, thank you. And how are you?
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Veoma dobro, hvala ti. A kako si ti?

Hallo Miller. How are you?: Yes, she is. She is very beautiful.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Da, ona jeste. Ona je veoma lepa.

Hallo Miller. How are you?: Has she a house in this street?
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Ima li ona kuću u ovoj ulici?

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Does she like books?
Yes, she does.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?:
Voli li ona knjige?
Da, ona voli.

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Does she like green hats?
No, she does not. She likes blue hats.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?:
Da li ona voli zelene šešire?
Ne, ona ne voli. Ova voli plave šešire.

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Do you like green hats?
No, I don't.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?:
Da li ti voliš zelene šešire?
Ne, ja ne volim.

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Look, I have a pen.
It is a new pen.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?:
Gledaj, imam pero/penkalo.
To je novo pero/penkalo.

Hallo Miller. How are you?: Yes, it is. It writes very well.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Da, jeste. Ono piše veoma dobro.

Hallo Miller. How are you?: No, it is not. It does not write very well.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Ne, nije. Ono ne piše veoma dobro.

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Is the pen strong?
Yes, it is.
No, it is weak.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?:
Da li je pero jako?
Da, jeste.
Ne, ono je slabo.

Hallo Miller. How are you?:
Do you like tea?
Yes, I do.

Do you drink milk?
No, I don't.

Have you five friends?
I have six.
It is strong, and it is beautiful.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Ono je jako, i ono je lepo.

Hallo Miller. How are you?: It is not weak, and it is not thin.
Zdravo Milere. Kako si?: Ono nije slabo, i ono nije mršavo.
